statements: DELETE FROM identity_theft_alerts WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_description = 'Unauthorized access';
DELETE FROM identity_theft_alerts WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00';
DELETE FROM identity_theft_alerts WHERE alert_level > 2 AND user_id = 456;
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE flagged = TRUE;
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Attempted Fraud' AND flagged = TRUE;
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 3 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM login_attempts WHERE user_id = 5 AND timestamp < '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
